info.description: This is the backend API for a conference ticketing system.
info.title: Multi-Track Ticketing API

get.description: Returns the list of events the authenticated user is registered for, including registration metadata.
get.summary: Get events the current user is registered for

200.description: data is an array of event + registration objects

post.description: Registers the authenticated user as an attendee for the specified event. Idempotent: returns 201 when a new registration is created, 200 when already registered.
post.summary: Register the current attendee for an event

post.description: Registers the authenticated user as an attendee for the event with the given event_code. Idempotent: returns 201 when a new registration is created, 200 when already registered.
post.summary: Register for an event by event code

post.description: Send a one-time login code to the given email. The code expires after a short period.
Exchange the one-time code for a JWT and user. Creates the user on first successful login. Returns token, token_type, and user.
post.summary: Verify login code and get token

200.description: data contains token, token_type, and user

post.description: Create a new conference event. Only name is accepted in the body; id, event_code and timestamps are server-generated. The authenticated user becomes the event owner.

get.description: Returns events where the authenticated user is the owner. Requires Bearer token.
get.summary: List events owned by the current user

200.description: data is an array of events

get.description: Returns the event, its rooms, and all sessions for that event. Requires authentication.

200.description: data contains event, rooms, and sessions

delete.description: Delete an event and all its associated data (rooms, sessions). Only the event owner can delete. Requires authentication.

patch.description: Updates event date, description, and location (lat/lng). Only the event owner can update. Optional fields omitted from body are unchanged. Requires authentication.

post.description: Import rooms and sessions from Sessionize for a specific event

get.description: Returns a paginated list of emails invited to the event (with id and sent_at). Only the event owner can list. Use page and page_size query params. Optional search filters by email substring (case-insensitive). Requires authentication.
get.summary: List invited emails for an event

post.description: Send invitation emails to register for the event. Body contains a string of emails separated by commas or spaces. Only the event owner can invite. Each invitation is persisted and emailed; duplicates for the same event are skipped. Returns count of sent and list of failed addresses.

200.description: data contains sent count and failed list

400.description: error.code: bad_request (empty or no valid emails)

get.description: Returns the list of rooms for the event. Only the event owner can list. Requires authentication.

200.description: data is an array of rooms

get.description: Returns a single room for the event. Only the event owner can access. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Deletes a room and its sessions. Only the event owner can delete. Requires authentication.

patch.description: Updates room details (capacity, description, how_to_get_there, not_bookable). Only the event owner can update. Optional fields omitted from body are unchanged (not_bookable keeps current value when omitted). Requires authentication.
Toggles the not_bookable flag for a room. Only the event owner can toggle. Requires authentication.

get.description: Returns the list of team members for the event. Only the event owner can list. Requires authentication.
get.summary: List team members of an event

200.description: data is an array of team members

post.description: Add a user as a team member of the event by email. Only the event owner can add. Returns 404 with a message if no user exists with that email. Requires authentication.
post.summary: Add a team member to an event

parameters.description: Email of the user to add
parameters.name: body

201.description: data contains the added team member

404.description: error.code: not_found (no user with that email)

delete.description: Remove a user from the event's team members. Only the event owner can remove. Requires authentication.
delete.summary: Remove a team member from an event

parameters.description: User ID (UUID) of the team member to remove
parameters.name: userID

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile (id, email, name, created_at, updated_at). Requires Bearer token.

patch.description: Update the authenticated user's profile. Accepts optional name and/or last_name only; email cannot be updated. Requires Bearer token.

parameters.description: Fields to update (name and/or last_name, both optional)
parameters.name: body
